Hero.title: Build Your Next Big Thing, Faster.
Hero.subtitle: Our SaaS platform provides all the tools you need to succeed. Focus on your product, we handle the rest.

Features.title: Discover Our Features
Features.feature1Desc: Reliable and scalable infrastructure that grows with your business.
Features.feature2Desc: Gain deep insights with our comprehensive analytics dashboard.
Features.feature3Desc: Connect effortlessly with your favorite third-party services.
Features.feature4Desc: Our dedicated support team is here to help you around the clock.

DashboardPages.overviewContent: Welcome to your dashboard. Here is a summary of your account.
DashboardPages.analyticsContent: Detailed analytics and reports will be displayed here.
DashboardPages.usersContent: Manage your users, roles, and permissions here.
DashboardPages.settingsContent: Configure your account and application settings here.
